text: Crowell Little is a former American football and college basketball player. He served as the head football coach at Davidson College in Davidson, North Carolina. As a college athlete, Little was two-sport star at the University of North Carolina in Chapel Hill, North Carolina from 1936 to 1937. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Davidson Wildcats football coaches Category:North Carolina Tar Heels football coaches Category:North Carolina Tar Heels football players Category:North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball players
title: Crowell Little
